p: The Public Prosecutors Office justifies the demand because of a lack of a contingency plan intended to prevent the dissemination of the coronavirus in LSIEs, as well as an increase in the number of cases reported among elderly individuals living in LSIEs and their employees, along with a lack of medications, PPE, personal hygiene and cleaning products, as recommended by the State Department of Health, Health Surveillance and ANVISA (Brazilian Health Regulatory Agency).
